body_html:
Not quite, it's more like
a = numpy.random.choice(1_000_000, 100_000, replace=False, p=probs)
but you're absolutely right, we are unreasonably slow there.
Thank you for reporting and insisting!

body:
Not quite, it's more like
`a = numpy.random.choice(1_000_000, 100_000, replace=False, p=probs)`
but you're absolutely right, we are unreasonably slow there.
Thank you for reporting and insisting!
